import React, {useEffect} from "react"; import SideBar from "./SideBar"; import Alerts from "./Alerts"; import ExternalWebsites from "./ExternalWebsites"; import withContext from "../withContext"; const ViewPosting = props => { useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0) }, []) const theID = props.match.params.id; let posting = props.context.getPost(theID); return ( <>

{posting.title}


  • Home
  • News Articles and Notices
  • {posting.title}
By : {posting.author}
{posting.date ? ( {posting.date + " New"} ) : ( No Date Available )}

{posting.body}



) } export default withContext(ViewPosting);
